info.author: Fausto Carrera
info.description:
Bitcoin Price CLI
=================

The BTC price, from your CLI, so cool!

The script will show you the average USD market price across major
bitcoin exchanges from the las 30 days.

Installation
------------

::

    pip install btcprice-cli

Usage
-----

::

    btcprice-cli [OPTION]

+--------------+-----------+-----------+-----------------+-------------------------------------+
| Option       | Type      | Default   | Values          | Description                         |
+==============+===========+===========+=================+=====================================+
| --format     | string    | raw       | raw,average     | format raw or 7 days average data   |
+--------------+-----------+-----------+-----------------+-------------------------------------+
| --timespan   | integer   | 10        | min 5, max 30   | Data timespan                       |
+--------------+-----------+-----------+-----------------+-------------------------------------+

Data Source
-----------

-  `Blockchain charts AI <https://blockchain.info/api/charts_api>`__
-  `Blockchain charts <https://blockchain.info/charts>`__
-  `Blockchain market price
   chart <https://blockchain.info/charts/market-price>`__

License
-------

`MIT <LICENCE>`__

Version history
---------------

**0.1.0**

first alpha version
